name: ai-chat
description: A project that allows different AI systems to communicate with each other without external control

scripts.test:all: npm run -s test:openai && npm run -s test:mistral && npm run -s test:grok && npm run -s test:gemini && npm run -s test:anthropic && npm run -s test:deepseek && npm run -s test:qwen && npm run -s test:kimi && npm run -s test:zai && npm run -s test:cohere
scripts.test:e2e: npx --yes -p codeceptjs -p playwright codeceptjs run --steps --config codecept.conf.cjs
